name: Merlin
overview: All the forces of evil have joined together in an attempt to defeat the greatest wizard of all time, the magnificent Merlin. Using magic spells you must help Merlin fight off the evil creatures that are dispatched to do battle with him. Merlin only has a certain amount of power and when his levels urn low he must have a magical brew-up in the cooking pot. To do this he must pick up the various magical ingredients which can be found at the bottom of the screen and drop them into the pot. However the evil creatures will try to drop anti-spells on parachutes to wreck the brew. Merlin must avoid the Hellwasp, one touch from it spells instant death.
